choices: Prey species are the giants, predator species are small.
Someone gets the power to shrink or grow whomever they wish.
Skip the plot, randomness goes here.
1.content: The giants have come out to enjoy their dominance over the small, this doesn't mean that some of the giants aren't -nice- giants. All kinds may be found at any size and in any shape. Take a look.
1.title: Beginnings.

11.content:
Thooms can be heard throughout the land as the massive forms of herbivores thunder throughout the world. In some areas, cities of lowly lions, tigers, bears and many others surrounded. In others, villages that used to contain powerful tribes are now at the mercy of what they used to kill for food. Those once called "Prey" are out for their revenge. Well, at least some of them are.

"Don't worry, I'm not going to hurt you." Speaks a rather massive lapine to the husky in his handpaw, "if anything, you're probably safer with me than in the city, the others seem to be enjoying our newfound height a little too much..."
11.title: Prey species are the giants, predator species a...

122.content:
The day start again and the sun's rays covert the green landscape, the land filled with forests and prairies give the appearance of be a peaceful land. But the habitants of Haleyard know what the silence will not last for a long time, they know what the nocturnal terrors are soon replaced for the diurnals.

Meanwhile a good bunch of the habitants wait for the inevitable the rest have to work in the common tasks like raising food for themselves and take care of their homes, sadly that was more ease of say than do. Since the instauration of the tribute the principal task of the town was raise the “small” tribute for their master.

Near to the town was s little hill, in its summit was placed a great flat rock what serve how a rudimentary table, every day some quantity of food or other valuable things have to be offered, if not, the consequences would be so horrible for contemplate.

Strangely the morning was passing without any annoyance and for first time it seems that one day finally will be free of the avian terror. Unfortunately the tormentor was only tardy for the date and before any of the inhabitants of Haleyard could foresee the avian menace was here

The little furs know now what they live under the shadow of…
122.title: Sky Nightmares

choices: One Bird (All other birds have grown as well)
Goofed yah! It's actually a multitude of Giant birds.
1222.content: I do plan on adding more to this. But. Just one bird out of the entire species (All birds Grew but only one showed up)? Or just one lucky bird who grew, all by him or herself?
1222.title: One Bird

12221.title: One Bird (All other birds have grown as well)

122211.content: What is the gender oh our giant Avian?
122211.title: Gender.

1222112.content:
You know, the land of Haleyard wasn't always the way it is now. It used to be exactly like any other place in its time period. That is. Until "it" happened. The Avian race was severely discriminated against prior to the incident. They were labelled as the lesser race. Their court systems were very biased against them, someone could simply accuse an avian of a crime, and they would be arrested, even if they weren't involved. The poverty rate of avians was 99%. None of them could hold a job, and if they could even get a job, they wouldn't keep it for more than a week.

Being discarded from society, most Avians turned to religion. Praying to their god Faravahar, for salvation. Their prayers fell mostly on deaf ears. But one fatefull night. A little, 12 year old girl named Amarylys, gave sacrifice of blood on their gods makeshift shrine. Which was hidden away from their prersecutive society, deep underground. "Please Faravahar, give us the power to rise above the hatred and discrimination against our race. Give us the power to, finally, be treated better, if not as well as our discrimiators. Please, do not let this prayer fall upon deaf ears once more. Amine." The little girl prayed. Little did she know that her prayers would actually be heard. Though, her prayers would not be answered by way of, the other people just magically wanted to treat them better. Instead they were answered by way of power. Such power that would be feared by all those not wielding it. And in this case, the ones wielding it were the Avians.
1222112.title: How is all happened.

choices: She wakes up in a cell. She is shorter and much weaker than the other anthros.
She wakes up still tied to the ground. Negotiations have started.
12221121.content:
6 years later. Much has changed. The Avians were being treated as higher beings. In a literal sense. The leaders of the avian race has demanded reparations for their harsh treatment throughout history. And so a yearly tribute was organized, but not without some. "Encouragement" from the avians. At first, the smaller anthros defied them, denying them their reparations and even fighting them. This was swiftly ended by the Avians with their superior size and strength. After that, a large amount of food would be placed on a big, flat rock at the top of a hill and, this year, would be retrieved by the girl that started it all: Amarylys.

Amarylys wasn't that same little girl anymore though. If the growth of her species would not have happened, she would currently be standing at a slightly taller than average, six foot stature. But, now she stands in a menacing 40 foot tall frame. Those six years were good to her, development wise, gaining some soft bouncy D cup breasts that, at normal size, would have been compared to the size of volleyballs. And a rotund pair of buttocks that could be compared to the size of her breasts. Being a crow, she kept her feathers dark but slightly grey, smooth, and slightly reflective. She keeps the feathers on the top of her head, which would be her hair if she was human, short. She may resent the smaller anthros for their harsh treatment towards her species and herself for the first 12 years of her life, but she does not wish them any harm

"Man, Benji is gonna kill me if I don't get this in time." Amarylys was late. She was supposed to get the tribute two hours ago, but she woke up 20 minutes late. Even with her expert flying skills, she wasn't going to make it in time. Eventually, she made it to the tribute site, and there were a lot of tiny anthros waiting for her there. "Uhh, hi. I was told that there wasn't going to be this many of you." Amarylys said nervously. An older looking man came forward. "We are here to take back what is rightfully ours. And to be free from your tyranny. Quickly, restrain her!" The older man shouted. Immediately, a catapult from behind a building launched a large boulder and it successfully made contact with Amarylyss cranium. Disoriented, she began to stumble and was tripped by a long rope at her feet. She fell like a mighty oak, and whilst still on the ground, she was being tied to the soil. She lost her consciousness there, still unsure about what they wanted with her.
12221121.title: 6 years later.

choices: OVER HERE! I got some more choices for yah.
1222122.title: More.

12221222.title: OVER HERE! I got some more choices for yah.

12222.content: Well. What gender is it?
12222.title: One Bird (Just this one bird)

1222221.content:
The Avian people aren't exactly "welcome" in the land of Haleyard. They made up most of the impoverished population for crying out loud. Most females went to involuntary prostitution to make any money at all. They didn't want this life, they were just born into it. One of these women is recently turned 18 year old Amarylys. She knew that she would have to do it, but she never wanted to. What she wanted to do was study to become a mage, enchanchress, or alchemist, but thanks to the fact that avians are outcasted and looked down upon, she could never accomplish those dreams. Well, until now.

=Bio=
Amarylys was a naturally gifted little girl, being able to read by age 1, it was obvious what she was destined for. But fate had other things in mind. Being born an avian, she was unable to properly nurture her gift with school education. But she did find a rudimentary, and illegal way to learn on her own. She often stole books from the library and the unorganized, forgetful court wizard, teaching herself spells and how to make potions at a young age. Making healing potions and using healing spells on the sick and injured, and making energizing potions for the weak were some of her favorite things to do.

As for her appearance, she has a body that makes her look like she has a lot of money. Having grown natural breasts the size of basketballs and a butt comparable in size really help her get the money she needs for potion ingredients and a roof to sleep under. Standing at a slightly above average height of 6' 1" help her keep away guys who want to get intimate with out paying the fee. Her feathers are grey but shiny, shiny almost to a point where they are reflective. Her head feathers, or what humans call them, "Hair" is kept short and spiked backward. In the end, Amarylys is just a really smart anthropomorphic crow woman with big dreams. But the question is. How will she achieve those dreams.

(Those last two sentences are asking,: how will she grow, and I, the writer, am going to put the answers to that question as choices below.)
1222221.title: Chosen

choices: I'm one of the evil versions of both male and female dogs.

choices: The adventures of Captain Cookbook and Cupcake Kitten.

Okay now that we've established what gender of dog you are and are on the side of good, also since your starting size is small now it's time to choose a scenario as well.

The adventures of Captain Cookbook and Cupcake Kitten: In honor of Muppet Babies 30th anniversary and its Ghost Busters inspired episode Good Clean Fun, you and your fellow co star a yellow robot cat that hails from 22nd century Japan who will now be renamed Peter, are a couple of mild mannered Sumo wrestlers who train at the local Sumo Stable in Downtown Metropolis, until your Sumo Stable is eaten by a pair of giant dough monsters namely your love interest Elizabeth the Pink Poodle A.K.A The Doggy Dough Girl and Peter's girlfriend a pink robot cat who will also renamed Nora A.K.A. The Kitty Dough Girl.

1511112.content:
(In this story, the anthros are very humanoid looking. They have human like legs, ending in paws, hooves, etc. They also have arms like a human, ending in hands. They can wear clothes or not, as fur covers every inch of their body. Now, for the character selection.)

Mike
5'6" tall
Wolf anthro

Mike is a likable guy, very friendly and outgoing. He wakes up from a dream, it saying he had size changing powers. He thinks it's not real, but he'll soon find out that it is indeed real.
1511112.title: Beginning of your growing power.

15111122.content:
Name: Comet
Type: anthro pegasus
Height: 6'0"

Comet is a blue coated pony with black a mane and tail. He lives in ponyville, where he has lived for a good amount of his life. Most of the population in ponyville are mares, so he will get a good use out of his powers to grow the mares.
15111122.title: What about ponies?

choices: Grow her out of her clothes.
151111221.content:
Comet sat on his bed, in deep thought. He had just woken up from a dream that told him he had the powers to change the size of things. And when he did, the universe would change to make it seem like they were always that size, only he would notice the change. He wanted to see if this was real, so he got up, changed into his casual clothing, a plain shirt and shorts and head out.

He knew the perfect place to try his powers, Twilight's castle. Twilight was a good friend of his, and almost his height at 5'10".

"Hey Twilight!" He greeted when he found the room she was in.

"Hi Comet." She greeted back. She was wearing a simple purple long sleeves it's some jeans. Clothing was a preference in Equestria, as the ponies fur covered their entire body.

"So, what are you doing today?"

"Just reading."

"As usual." Comet said, Twilight just rolled her eyes with a small smile. Her then decided to teats his powers. He concentrated on the mare to grow larger, and , to his amazement, she did. He stopped growing her out of shock, leaving her two inches tall, as tall as him now. She didn't seem to take any notice of the boost in height.

He concentrated more on her growing, he decided that he would...
151111221.title: Choose.

choices: Comet stays and grows the mare more.
He leaves to find another growing target.
1511112211.content:
Comet decide to leave the clothes behind on the growing, as they werent entirely needed. He watched as her clothes began to strain, soon, the clothes started to tear in places. After a while of growing, the clothes finally ripped off, now only her purple coat covering her body and protecting her dignity.

The now 7'4" Twilight blushed a little when her clothes tore off, still unaware that she just grew out of them.

"Sorry about not being clothed, but it seems that I have grown to big for them." She said with an embarrassed smile.

"Don't worry, you still have your lavender coat covering you." Comet responded with his own smile.

"Thanks Comet." She responded while picking him up in a hug. Comet blushed a little when being picked up by the now giant mare. This was incredible, she now towered over him by 1 foot and 4 inches.
1511112211.title: Grow her out of her clothes.

1512.content: So how do you or others become giant?
1512.title: Male and female giants?

154.content:
Even so many giants have taken over the world, not many survived their onslaught. Various giants of wolves and dragons have invaded many territory for food; although some would just take prisoners as slaves for whatever they needed for their pleasure.

One young fox who was hiding out near the wreckage. Yesterday five wolves have invaded their home and destroyed the city's defense. Eventually one of the wolves decided to fall back and take few of the foxes survivors, taking them back to their lair.

Suddenly a massive dragon suddenly land right in front of the chief who however didn't flinch by the dragon's presence.
154.title: Some good, some evil giants.

info.brief_description: The macrofurs decide that the smaller furs deserve some attention.
info.description:
What will the small furries do now that the gigantic ones have decided to play? The story is pretty open in terms of what can be done and what types of settings can be used. The only thing I would ask is that the grammar and spelling is decent, a missing comma or period isn't a big deal most of the time (though, please do your best). What I will remove chapters for is usually horrid misuse of spelling: "i" or "r" for I and "our" or "are", things like that.

That said, my grammar is far from perfect so this isn't me sitting on some high horse. :)

Other than that, enjoy.
